title: Fix footer layout and add 4 images to footer

requirements.text: Fix the footer layout and styling in the rendered document (both in PreviewDialog.tsx and renderDocumentToCanvas.ts). Ensure the footer is properly aligned, has consistent padding/margins, and visually matches the overall document design.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer is correctly positioned at the bottom of the document preview
Footer has consistent spacing and alignment
Footer styling is visually coherent with the rest of the document

requirements.text: Add 4 user-provided images to the footer area in the rendered document. Display the 4 images as static assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/) and render them horizontally in the footer row within both PreviewDialog.tsx and renderDocumentToCanvas.ts.

quotes: there i want to add 4 images which i will provide you now

acceptanceCriteria: 4 images are displayed in the footer of the document preview
Images are laid out horizontally and evenly spaced within the footer
Images are rendered correctly in both the preview dialog and the PDF canvas output

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Footer images must be served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated/, not through the backend
nonGoals: Changing header layout or logo size
Modifying backend data models or templates
Adding footer images to the TemplateDesigner customization flow

required: Footer banner image 1 — decorative institutional/financial badge or emblem (footer-img-1.dim_200x80.png)
Footer banner image 2 — decorative institutional/financial badge or emblem (footer-img-2.dim_200x80.png)
Footer banner image 3 — decorative institutional/financial badge or emblem (footer-img-3.dim_200x80.png)
